story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with a vision to supply high-quality industrial products to European and international markets, MetaNord OÃœ has established itself as a reliable partner for businesses across various industries. Being based in Estonia, we leverage our strategic location to efficiently serve customers throughout Europe and beyond.
story.paragraph2: Our team consists of professionals with extensive experience in industrial product supply, quality control, and international logistics. This expertise allows us to deliver superior quality products that meet the specific needs of our diverse customer base.
story.paragraph3: As we grow, our commitment to quality, competitive pricing, and exceptional service remains unwavering. We continually expand our product range and enhance our capabilities to better serve our customers' evolving needs.

mission.title: Our Mission and Values
mission.subtitle: At MetaNord, we are committed to providing premium quality products backed by exceptional service. Our values guide everything we do:

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We never compromise on the quality of our products. Every item in our catalog undergoes rigorous quality control to meet the highest industry standards.

customer.title: Customer-Centric Approach
customer.description: We place our customers at the center of all our actions. Understanding and fulfilling their unique requirements is our top priority.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to implementing sustainable business practices and environmentally responsible operations throughout our supply chain.

partners.title: Our Global Partners
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with trusted manufacturers and suppliers from around the world to bring you the best products at competitive prices:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to our most common questions

q1.question: What types of aluminum profiles do you offer?
q1.answer: We offer a wide range of aluminum profiles including standard structural profiles, machine-building profiles, LED profiles, and custom solutions. Our catalog includes various shapes, sizes, and finishes suitable for different applications in construction, engineering, and design.

q2.question: Do you provide international shipping?
q2.answer: Yes, we provide international shipping to most countries. Shipping costs and delivery times vary based on destination and order size. Please contact our sales team for specific shipping information for your region.

q3.question: Can I request custom specifications for products?
q3.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in custom solutions and can adapt products to meet your specific project requirements. Please provide detailed specifications when requesting a quote, and our engineers will work with you to deliver exactly what you need.

q4.question: How can I get technical support for your products?
q4.answer: Our technical support team is available to assist with product selection, installation advice, and troubleshooting. You can reach them via email at support@metanord.eu or by phone during business hours. We also provide comprehensive documentation for all our products.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and business operations. If you don't see your question answered here, please contact us directly.
faq.metaDescription: Find answers to common questions about MetaNord's products, services, delivery terms, and technical support. Get the information you need for your infrastructure projects.

0.question: What types of products does MetaNord supply?
0.answer: MetaNord specializes in distributing aluminum profiles, polyethylene pipes, steel components, and other infrastructure materials sourced from trusted global manufacturers.

1.question: Do you offer custom manufacturing or tailored solutions?
1.answer: Yes. We can provide custom dimensions, finishes, or specifications based on project needs. Please contact our sales team for customized quotations and engineering review.

2.question: What are your delivery times and terms?
2.answer: Delivery times depend on product type and quantity. Standard items are typically delivered within 7-14 business days across Europe. We also support express shipping upon request.

3.question: Can you deliver outside the European Union?
3.answer: Yes, we support international shipping to a wide range of markets, including non-EU countries. Please contact us with your location and required materials for a logistics assessment.

4.question: Do you provide product certificates and technical documentation?
4.answer: Absolutely. Most products come with EN standard certificates and detailed technical data sheets, available on the Documents page or on individual product pages.

5.question: How can I request a price quotation?
5.answer: You can request a price quotation through the contact form on our website, by emailing info@metanord.eu, or by calling +372 5771 3442. Please specify the required products, quantities, and delivery location.

6.question: What quality assurance does MetaNord provide?
6.answer: All our products undergo rigorous quality checks to ensure they meet European standards for durability, safety, and performance. We partner with certified manufacturers who maintain strict quality control systems.
